name: Caddy
description: Web server with automatic HTTPS that's easy to configure and deploy.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  caddy:
    image: caddy:latest
    container_name: caddy
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "{{HTTP_PORT}}:80"
      - "{{HTTPS_PORT}}:443"
    volumes:
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/config
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
      - {{SITE_PATH}}:/usr/share/caddy
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=caddy"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=web"

notes: Place your website files in the site directory
Configure via Caddyfile in config directory
